SEARCH
Package controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
The GameController class provides methods to configure and control the game. It handles starting the game, starting a level, closing all frames, getting the game icon, and ending the game.

  • Method Details

    • configGameController

      public static void configGameController(String musicPath, String fontName, Image icon)
      Configures the game controller with the specified music path, font name, and game icon.
      Parameters:
      musicPath - the path to the music files
      fontName - the name of the font used in the game
      icon - the icon image for the game

    • startGame

      public static void startGame()
      Starts the game by loading settings and displaying the title frame.

    • startLevel

      public static boolean startLevel(String levelName)
      Starts a level if both MIDI and WAV files for the level are valid.
      Parameters:
      levelName - the name of the level to start
      Returns:
      true if the level starts successfully, false otherwise

    • closeAllFrames

      public static void closeAllFrames()
      Closes all frames in the application.

    • getGameIcon

      public static Image getGameIcon()
      Gets the icon image of the game.
      Returns:
      the game icon image

    • endGame

      public static void endGame()
      Ends the game by stopping all music players, playing an ending sound, closing all frames, and exiting the application.
